hero.title: Premium Paris Transfers
hero.subtitle: Experience luxury transportation with our professional Mercedes fleet. Airport transfers, city tours, and special occasions made effortless.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional transportation solutions tailored to your needs with premium comfort and reliability

airportTransfer.name: Airport Transfer
airportTransfer.description: Seamless transfers to and from Charles de Gaulle, Orly, and Beauvais airports with professional drivers

disneyland.name: Disneyland Paris
disneyland.description: Direct transfers to Disneyland Paris and its hotels with magical comfort for the whole family

privateTour.name: Private Tour
privateTour.description: Customized 4-hour Paris city tours tailored to your preferences with expert local guides

weddingTransfer.name: Wedding Transfer
weddingTransfer.description: Elegant transportation for your special day

businessTransfer.name: Business Transfer
businessTransfer.description: Professional transfers for business meetings and events

customTransfer.name: Custom Transfer
customTransfer.description: Tailored transportation solutions for your specific needs

serviceVip.name: VIP Service
serviceVip.description: Enjoy an exclusive travel experience with our VIP transport service. Discreet, luxurious, and tailored to your needs. Perfect for business executives, celebrities, or any client looking for first-class service.

tourGuide.name: Tour Guide Service
tourGuide.description: Professional guided tours of Paris with expert local guides. Discover the city's history, culture, and hidden gems with personalized itineraries tailored to your interests.

paris-city-tour.name: Paris City Tour (4H-8H)
paris-city-tour.description: Discover the beauty of Paris with personalized city tours. Explore iconic landmarks and hidden gems with a knowledgeable driver or tour guide, at your own pace and comfort.

personal-security.name: Personal Security Service
personal-security.description: For clients who require enhanced protection, we offer professional personal security services with trained personnel, ensuring your safety and discretion during all travels. (2SPROTEC)

eventTransport.name: Event Transport
eventTransport.description: Professional transportation services for events, conferences, and special occasions

fleet.title: Our Premium Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Experience luxury with our Mercedes vehicles, each equipped with premium amenities

car.description: Business class sedan for comfortable transfers

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.subtitle: Premium amenities and services designed for your ultimate comfort and satisfaction

wifi.title: Complimentary Wi-Fi
wifi.description: Stay connected during your journey with high-speed internet

entertainment.title: Premium Entertainment
entertainment.description: Netflix, YouTube, and music streaming for your enjoyment

chargers.title: Device Chargers
chargers.description: Keep your devices powered up with multiple charging options

childSafety.title: Child Safety
childSafety.description: Baby seats available for ages 0-10 years with safety certification

payment.title: Flexible Payment
payment.description: Multiple payment methods available both online and onboard

drivers.title: Professional Drivers
drivers.description: Experienced, courteous, and multilingual professional chauffeurs

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say

about.title: About Paris Transfers
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for premium transportation services in Paris. Experience luxury, reliability, and exceptional service with our professional Mercedes fleet.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, Paris Transfers has quickly established itself as one of the most reliable and luxurious transportation services in Paris. What started as a small family business has grown into a premium service provider trusted by thousands of clients.
ourStory.paragraph2: Our mission is simple: to provide exceptional transportation services that exceed our clients' expectations. We believe that every journey should be comfortable, safe, and memorable.
ourStory.paragraph3: With our fleet of Mercedes vehicles and professional drivers, we ensure that whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, your experience with us will be nothing short of exceptional.

ourValues.title: Our Values
ourValues.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

safetyFirst.title: Safety First
safetyFirst.description: All our vehicles are regularly maintained and our drivers are fully licensed and insured.

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: We understand the importance of time and ensure you reach your destination on schedule.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from booking to arrival.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Our team consists of experienced professionals dedicated to providing the best service.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Premium Transportation?
cta.subtitle: Book your transfer today and discover why thousands of clients trust Paris Transfers for their transportation needs.
